doTeleport

public static void doTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player p1,
                              org.bukkit.entity.Player p2,
                              java.lang.String message)
Teleport one player to another. If player is opped, fancy teleport will be done. Adds a custom message to be displayed.

Parameters:
p1 - player to be teleported
p2 - player to be teleported to
message - the message to be displayed

doFancyTeleport

private static void doFancyTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player streamer,
                                    org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
Teleports a player NEAR to another player If possible, they will be placed 5 blocks away, facing towards the destination player.

Parameters:
streamer - the Player who will be fancy-teleported
p - the Player they are to be teleported to

isSpaceForPlayer

public static boolean isSpaceForPlayer(org.bukkit.Location feetLocation)
Calculates if it's possible for a player to fit in a certain spot.

Parameters:
feetLocation - the location where the feet should be
Returns:
wheter or not there's place for both his feet and head

isSpaceForPlayer

public static boolean isSpaceForPlayer(org.bukkit.World w,
                                       int x,
                                       int y,
                                       int z)
Calculates if it's possible for a player to fit in a certain spot.

Parameters:
w - the world in which we need to check if there's space for the player
x - the x coordinate of the block to check
y - the y coordinate of the block (at the feet) to check
z - the z coordinate of the block to check
Returns:
whether or not there's place for both his feet and head

isSpaceForPlayer

Determine whether a given block is a either empty or liquid (but not lava)

Parameters:
b - the block to check
Returns:
whether the block is suitable
